a.span: WPS seniors named to list of 2020 Governor’s Scholars

div.p: Twenty-seven Wichita Public Schools seniors have been named 2020 Governor’s Scholars, representing the top 1 percent of high school seniors in Kansas.

a.title: Go to comments for WPS seniors named to list of 2020 Governor’s Scholars

a.span: Four Heights seniors named Kansas CTE Scholars

div.p: Four Heights seniors are among 57 Kansas high school seniors named 2020 Kansas Career and Technical Education (CTE) Scholars.

a.title: Go to comments for Four Heights seniors named Kansas CTE Scholars

a.span: WPS offering grab-and-go meals twice a week

div.p: Meals will be offered to any child ages 1-18 at 18 sites around Wichita.

a.title: Go to comments for WPS offering grab-and-go meals twice a week

a.span: WPS named one of the Best Communities for Music Education

div.p: For the fourth time, Wichita Public Schools has been named one of the 2020 Best Communities for Music Education by the National Association of Music Merchants.

a.title: Go to comments for WPS named one of the Best Communities for Music Education

a.span: Video: Reading Along With SUPERintendent Thompson - The Very Impatient Caterpillar

div.p: Prior to the COVID-19 restrictions, Wichita Mayor Brandon Whipple joined Dr. Thompson to read the latest book in her "Read Along with SUPERintendent Thompson" series "The Very Impatient Caterpillar," by Ross Burach.

a.title: Go to comments for Video: Reading Along With SUPERintendent Thompson - The Very Impatient Caterpillar

a.span: Video: Growing Up WPS - Phonological awareness

div.p: This video shows parents how to help their child develop phonological awareness skills with a game of "Odd One Out," where the object is to listen for the word with a different beginning or ending sound.

a.title: Go to comments for Video: Growing Up WPS - Phonological awareness

div.p: At the March 9 BOE meeting, the Board heard a budget development report from Susan Willis, the district's chief financial officer.

a.title: Go to comments for BOE video: Budget Development Report
Link to printable school year calendars in English, Spanish and Vietmanese
